publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2415.1 Donald Gorrie:Scottish Suffragette Women—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2415) in the name of Ms Rosemary Byrne, leave out from “to commemorate” to end and insert “to encourage widespread recognition and commemoration of the part Scottish women played in the women’s suffrage movement as either suffragists or suffragettes, namely whether they acted within or outwith the law.”
S2M-2415.1 Scottish Suffragette Women (lodged on 11 March 2005) Nora Radcliffe* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
